titles.title: Emergency Book Fund Act
To provide emergency assistance to local public libraries for the purchase of books and other library materials and resources.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor-Management Relations.

bill.summary: 5/25/1993--Introduced. Emergency Book Fund Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to allocate supplementary funds to State library administrative agencies for public libraries to use to purchase books and other library materials and resources. Authorizes appropriations.
